data.name: The Duplicate Seal
data.description: The next scroll or consumable you use will be duplicated.
data.lore: A bureaucratic seal that somehow gained the power to reproduce documents - and their contents - perfectly.

data.name: Woundglass Shard
data.description: Reveals a room that should not exist. (1 use per floor)
data.lore: A fragment of a mirror that shows not what is, but what should have been hidden.

data.name: Oathstone
data.description: Take a vow for this floor. Keep it for rewards, break it for consequences.
data.lore: A stone that binds words to reality. Oaths sworn upon it cannot be forgotten.

cost.description: Breaking the vow applies stun and penalties

data.name: Crown-Splinter
data.description: See through walls briefly. The longer held, the more your vision fractures.
data.lore: A shard of the Last King's crown, granting insight at the cost of clarity.

cost.description: Permanently reduces vision range on this floor

data.name: Ledger of the Unborn
data.description: Summon a phantom ally. A name is added, another forgotten.
data.lore: A book containing the names of those who were never born. Write one name, erase another.
